name: Save Vasa
description:
Save Vasa

The year is 1628, you play as captain Söfring Hansson aboard the regalship Vasa. The ship has recently embarked on it´s maiden voyage towards Älvsnabben in the Stockholm archipelago. As fate tells, the ship would sink a few moments after the journey began. However you are now in control, the water rises quickly so hurry and use your knowledge of hindsight and the recently gained superstrength and remove weight on the ship, save Vasa!

Controls:

WASD to move

Press E to interact on objects, walk to an opening to throw them of

Hold E to interact with the smaller cannons.

Press E on the hatch to change floors.
